column1: Little Goat Diner////The restaurant has an automated wait list that will send out texts when your table is ready. Sounds good in theory
column2: terrible in practice. The end result is that the restaurant seemingly holds tables for half an hour waiting for patrons to return. So if you wait inside
column3: expect to become increasingly frustrated at waiting an abnormally long amount of time while looking at a plethora of available seating. On our first visit
column4: multiple patrons that reserved tables after us were seated before us. When I came to inquire at the front desk they surprisingly aloof hostess said
column6: we've been looking for you." Thanks for both lying to me and insulting me. After waiting for an hour
